attributes.action: Force All MPs who are shown to have abused their EXPENSES to pay back all monies.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: AS it seems that MPs have been using the expense system as a way of increasing their pay, buying houses and refitting houses, the government should ask HMRC to go through all past 5 years of expenses and validate that they adhere to the Green Book, any expenses which fall outside of this rules should be claimed back from the claiment, including interest.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
